name: Sour Tangie
description: Tangie, also known as "Sunva," is a popular sativa marijuana strain. Bred by DNA Genetics, Sour Tangie is an 80% sativa cross between East Coast Sour Diesel and Tangie. Sour Tangie brings together the classic Sour Diesel aroma with Tangieâ€™s creative, elevating buzz and strong citrus overtones. This sativa has two different phenotypes that express either Sour Diesel or Tangie bud structures and effects.
